FieldName="MyJSONData" FieldValue="{}{{
	 var xmlDoc=new ActiveXObject("Microsoft.XMLDOM");
	 xmlDoc.async=false;
	 xmlDoc.loadXML("[[[[Dev2Field]]]]"); 
	var nodes = xmlDoc.documentElement.childNodes;
	var len = nodes.length;
	var result = "";
	for(var i = 0; i < len; i++){
		result += "{\""+nodes.item(i).nodeName+"\":\""+nodes.item(i).text+"\"}";
		if(i < len-1){
			result +=",";
		}
	}

}}" HasError="[HasError]" sap:VirtualizedContainerService.HintSize="511,423" InstructionList="[InstructionList]" IsSimulationEnabled="False" IsUIStep="False" IsValid="[IsValid]" IsWorkflow="False" OnResumeClearAmbientDataList="False" OnResumeClearTags="FormView,InstanceId,Bookmark,ParentWorkflowInstanceId,ParentServiceName,WebPage" UpdateAllOccurrences="False" /> </FlowStep> </FlowStep.Next> </FlowStep> </Flowchart.StartNode> <x:Reference>__ReferenceID0</x:Reference> <FlowStep> <sap:WorkflowViewStateService.ViewState> <scg:Dictionary x:TypeArguments="x:String, x:Object"> <av:Point x:Key="ShapeLocation">0,9</av:Point> <av:Size x:Key="ShapeSize">200,22</av:Size> </scg:Dictionary> </sap:WorkflowViewStateService.ViewState> <uaba:DsfCommentActivity DisplayName="DEF" sap:VirtualizedContainerService.HintSize="200,22" Text="01-02-2012 : Travis.Frisinger@dev2.co.za

Subworkflow of JSON Binder and JSON Binder Clean, 
used to build the JSON data stream before each 
respective service performs its additional 
transformation logic.
" /> </FlowStep> <x:Reference>__ReferenceID1</x:Reference> </Flowchart> </Activity>
